original_text:
For I have bent Judah as my bow;
    I have made Ephraim its arrow.
I will stir up your sons, O Zion,
    against your sons, O Greece,
    and wield you like a warrior's sword.
korean_text: 내가 유다를 당긴 활로 삼고 에브라임을 끼운 화살로 삼았으니 시온아 내가 네 자식들을 일으켜 헬라 자식들을 치게 하며 너를 용사의 칼과 같게 하리라

sentences.original_text: For I have bent Judah as my bow
I have made Ephraim its arrow
I will stir up your sons, O Zion
sentences.korean_translation: 오 시온아, 내가 네 아들들을 격발하리니

sentences.original_text: and wield you like a warrior's sword
